questionsData.question: Customer's Question
questionsData.answer: Payment is made in cash to the courier directly upon delivery to the recipient's address. By choosing this payment method, you have the opportunity to inspect and try on the ordered items. If any item doesn't suit you, you can simply return it to the courier without making a payment.
